Robes of War () is a Canadian animated short film, directed by Michèle Cournoyer and released in 2003. The film centres on the impact of war on women, centring in particular on an Iranian women wearing a chador.
It won the Jutra Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 12th Jutra Awards in 2010.
